// Command for terminal 

rosrun ardrone_autonomy ardrone_driver _realtime_navdata:=False _navdata_demo:=0
rosrun camera_calibration cameracalibrator.py --size 9x6 --square 0.025 image:=/ardrone/front/image_raw camera:=/ardrone/front
